title: web design
description: I am a full-stack junior developer with a focus on trhe front-end. I have a strong eye for design and a desire to grow as a developer.

title: graphic design
description: I have a background, degree, and passion for design. I worked for many years as a graphic designer, specializing in print and direct mail. My design style is clean, utilizing white space and typography to bring the client's product to life.

title: project management
description: I thrive on colaboration and organization and I love to see a project come to life. My experience in design and account management provides we with a unique understanding of the needs of each department, ensuring schedules are met.
